thread.title_full: Sep 26 | Floral Design Workshop Series - Late Bloomers | Bedford, NY Patch

author: New York
title: Sep 26 | Floral Design Workshop Series - Late Bloomers | Bedford, NY Patch
text: Late summer is a vibrant and beautiful time in Westchester. The meadows and gardens flourish with colorful flowers as the days get cooler. Explore foraging for late-blooming flowers and sustainable arranging. Choose from a variety of vases to create your unique arrangement. Learn how to create stunning seasonal arrangements that capture the beauty of the changing seasons. Date & Time: Thursday, September 26, 2024, 7-9 PM Materials & Tools: Vases, flowers, plant matter, wire. Tea, coffee, and refreshments included. Speakers: Ann Paul, Steve Ricker, Nadia Ghannam Cost: Non-members $50.00 | Members $45.00 This post was contributed by a community member. The views expressed here are the author's own.
